Html: I pulled up my pally from armory and checked for upgrades.  I am seeing very sporadic listings for alot of upgrades... expecially notable of these are the 232 TOC armor listings.  Im not seeing them listed at all for my pally.  The same occurs when I load my priest.  most of the 232 armor doesnt show up.  Any ideas?
I've had the same problem on my mage, I have no idea how to fix it so I'm hoping somebody can pop in and shed some light.
Check the filters. In the first few hours after release the default filters included had a lot of things turned off.
